data.eml:eml: Taxonomic studies of Glochidion (Phyllanthaceae) from the Indo-China Peninsula (I): G. shanense, a new species from Myanmar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yao, Gang, Cai, Jie, Wu, Youheng, Yang, Xuefei, Oo, Thaung Naing, Moe, Aung Zaw, Luo, Shixiao (2018): Taxonomic studies of Glochidion (Phyllanthaceae) from the Indo-China Peninsula (I): G. shanense, a new species from Myanmar. PhytoKeys 96: 57-62, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.96.24497, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.96.24497
